title: New build !   Cozy Studio w/ Rooftop Deck and outdoor grill
posting_body: Entirely new building from the ground up!
The building and units have a modern clean feel.
All new construction means all the latest safety requirements.
All units include in unit washer/dryer.
There is a rooftop patio area with great views and a front facing terrace with an outdoor kitchen.
- Large Walk in closet with closet system
- Murphy bed (queen size) with additional wardrobe
- Cordless cellular shades included in all windows
- Unit 302 is on the 2nd Floor in the rear of the building
- Rooftop outdoor fire pit and lounge seating
- 15 min walk to the heart of Hayes Valley
- 8 min walk to Van Ness Metro
- 14 min walk to 16th and Mission Bart or Civic Center Bart
- Trader Joe's and Costco nearby & Rainbow Grocery Market
- Tenant to set up own utilities for electricity & Internet (Monkey Brains available in building)
- You will need to provide your own queen size mattress if you plan to use the included Murphy bed
- Verifiable income = or greater than 3x the rent
Rental listings subject to change at any time.
